data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Barahona-Segovia, Rodrigo M., Barceló, Matías (2019): A new flower fly species of Cepa Thompson & Vockeroth (Diptera: Syrphidae) from the Valdivian evergreen forest hotspot, Chile. Zootaxa 4612 (3): 431-439, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4612.3.9|2 occurrences
